title: Transfare
body:
the new season had started and we all want the new start 
by making the Dynamic q and the new champ select u have improved the game enormously 
but some players (including me :D ) still not having fun
yea its much better now but still.................
so if u give them the chance to transfare  the server this will really help them 
the high ping is really really really a huge problem for us 
and two of the main reasons y we play league are to have fun and because its free 
in a country like mine getting 2600 rp to change server costs a huge amount of money 
so give them the chance if they change its good 4 then and idk if that is a problem for riot 
if they dont well u lose nothing
just sharing my thoughts and plz give me ur opinions and write a comment and i would really appreciate it 
thx {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body:
hey there,

I agree with u HATCHIEPI,
Riot should make transfers free or even with ip, **(for a week or something)**
It will help many people who joined the incorrect region or they joined region not close to 'em

ty

Hey there,

Region transfers aren't usually made free, can I ask where you're located and why you chose the OCE server if there is another server closer to you?
